pr_title: Enable build command to compile tests

timeline.message: Enable build command to compile tests

timeline.bodyText:
maven.test.skip.exec means compile and not executed, while previously it does not even compile. That is my understanding.
What is the issue previously?
timeline.author: kaisun2000
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,4 +19,4 @@
 # under the License.
 #
 
-mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip=true
+mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip.exec=true

replies.bodyText: I see. Previously admin may compiles failing but no one notice.
replies.author: kaisun2000

replies.bodyText:
I removed compiling before to improve the build time, because readme also doesn't compile the tests. Then today I was aware that helix admin webapp depends on helix-core test..
If you remove the local mvn cached jars and build, it would fail.
replies.author: huizhilu
